title: Billie Eilish 'tripping' over Anne-Marie and Jameela Jamil's Halloween looks
text:
Billie Eilish is ‘tripping’ after A-listers channel her for Halloween (Picture: PA / Getty)

Billie Eilish has been left ‘tripping’ as stars including Anne-Marie, Jameela Jamil, and Nina Dobrev have all dressed as her for Halloween.

Surely someone’s going to have to change.

The three stars completely nailed the 17-year-old’s look as they paid homage to her for the spooky holiday.

‘This s*** tripping me out,’ the Bad Guy singer wrote on a video of Anne-Marie, before adding: ‘Very accurate.’

‘This one too,’ she said over a snap of Jameela. High praise from the woman herself.

She shared Anne-Marie’s post on her socials (Picture: Instagram)

While Anne-Marie and Nina both rocked a typical Billie look, Jameela decided to go her own way, dressing as ‘Silly Eilish’.

‘I’m dressed as Silly Eilish, the weird third sibling they didn’t tell you about…. [pumpkin emoji],’ she wrote on Instagram as she shared a photo of herself in a tracksuit, with a crown on top of her head.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Frightfully good fun DJ’ing preview night for @Spotify’s Halloween costume pop-up, open on Saturday.’

Anne-Marie, meanwhile, could be spotted at the Kiss Haunted House Party in London, where she donned the singer’s iconic baggy green Chanel tee, pairing it with green shorts.

The Heavy hitmaker chucked in a leg brace for good measure and walked the red carpet in crutches. A+ for dedication there.

Meanwhile, The Perks Of Being A Wallflower actress Nina went a different way with her outfit, as she focused on the singer’s love for Louis Vuitton at the Casamigos Halloween Party in LA.

Even Jameela Jamil got in on the look (Picture: Getty)

Rocking an all-orange look, she had black eye makeup streaming down her face, with her roots dyed green.

There’s literally a Billie everywhere we look and we’re not even mad about it.

Anne-Marie threw in a leg-brace for good measure (Picture: PA)

As Halloween nears, it’s clear stars are going all out this year with their costumes, with Liam Payne giving us his best Clark Kent as he unbuttoned his shirt to show off his Superman outfit.

That’s not quite how a double identity works pal, but good effort regardless.

She’s the Bad Guy (Picture: BACKGRID)

Kem Cetiney took on a Joker inspired crazy clown look, and shared his costume on Instagram, saying: ‘Is it me or is it getting crazier out here?!’

And Paris Hilton’s LA do saw Kim Kardashian’s bestie Larsa Pippen look incredible as she stepped out in a racy Xena-inspired loin-cloth.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Meanwhile, Sean Paul appeared to rock up to the Kiss Haunted House party simply as himself.

There’s truly nothing spookier.

description: Billie Eilish 'tripping' as Anne-Marie, Jameela Jamil and Nina Dobrev channel Bad Guy singer for Halloween
